name: Color Jump 3D - Jelly Shift Up
description:
This is a relaxing and fun jelly bounce game,
The colorful gummy-like Q bombs are juicy!

Just tap the screen to pop up cute jelly gummies,
Avoid obstacles on both sides to find the right time to jump up continuously!

Unlock more jelly gummies to unlock more good moods,
Leisure and entertainment should be simple and suitable for everyone!
